Name: El Burro
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lime slice wheel.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring ginger beer.
Review: Ginger spice and tequila soured with lime.
History: Created by Henry Besant and Andres Masso , London, England. The name of this tequila-based version of the Moscow Mule translates from Spanish as 'The Donkey'.
Nutrition: One serving of El Burro contains 212 calories
